Using

Uniform images

Url (List) : https://assets.foxhole.tools/icons/uniforms/{name}.png

Items images

Url (List) : https://assets.foxhole.tools/icons/items/{name}.png

Map images

Url (List) : https://assets.foxhole.tools/icons/map/{name}.png

Menus images

Url (List) : https://assets.foxhole.tools/icons/menus/{name}.png

Structures images

Url (List) : https://assets.foxhole.tools/icons/structures/{name}.png

Techtree

Url (List) : https://assets.foxhole.tools/icons/techtree/{name}.png

Vehicles images

Url (List) : https://assets.foxhole.tools/icons/vehicles/{name}.png

Hegaxon maps (clasic)

Url (List) : https://assets.foxhole.tools/maps/clasic/{name}.png

Hegaxon maps (color)

Url (List) : https://assets.foxhole.tools/maps/color/{name}.png

Warmap tiles (clasic)

Url (List): https://assets.foxhole.tools/tiles/clasic/warmap/{z}/{z}_{x}_{y}.png zoom: 1 - 7

Warmap tiles (color)

Url (List): https://assets.foxhole.tools/tiles/color/warmap/{z}/{z}_{x}_{y}.png zoom: 1 - 7

Hexagone Tiles (clasic)

Url (List) : https://assets.foxhole.tools/tiles/clasic/{name}/{z}/{z}_{x}_{y}.png name: Refer to Maps map for name zoom: 1 - 7

Hexagone Tiles (color)

Url (List) : https://assets.foxhole.tools/tiles/color/{name}/{z}/{z}_{x}_{y}.png name: Refer to Maps map for name zoom: 1 - 7
